formatDescription: CorelDraw (styled CorelDRAW) is a vector graphics editor developed and marketed by Corel Corporation of Ottawa, Canada. It is also the name of Corel's Graphics Suite, which bundles CorelDraw with bitmap-image editor Corel Photo-Paint as well as other graphics-related programs.
provenanceCompoundName: Museum of London / Museum of London
formatProvenance: 08/2023 (v.113) - Added priority over fmt/1886 (Resource Interchange Format (RIFF)). Submitted by New York Public Libraries and Preservica.; 11/2023 (v.115)- Modified the offset values in the internal signature from null to 0 as part of a project to match PRONOM data with the xsd standard. Internally researched.

internalSignatures.name: CorelDraw X3
internalSignatures.note: RIFF (little-endian) or RIFX (big-endian) Form labeled CDRDvrsn (D=13)
